region.areYouSureThatYouWantToDeleteThisRegion: Are you sure that you want to delete this region?
region.name: Name
region.heading: Heading
region.atLeastOneColumnMustBeAdded: At least one column must be added
region.label: Label
region.atLeastOneColumnConditionMustBeAdded: At least one condition must be added.
region.listOfValuesViewIsMandatory: View for list of values is mandatory.
region.listOfValuesValueIsMandatory: Value for list of values is mandatory.
region.listOfValuesLabelIsMandatory: Label for list of values is mandatory.
region.subreportQueryParameterNotSameAsReportPa: Subreport pagination query parameter should not be same as report query parameter.
region.navigationTypeMustBeMenuBreadcrumbSitema: Navigation type must be either Menu, Breadcrumb or Sitemap.
region.paginationQueryParameterMayConsistOfChar: Pagination query parameter may consist of characters a-z A-Z and _.
region.inputNameMayConsistOfCharsAndUnderscores: Input name may consist of characters a-z A-Z and _.
region.conditionValueMustHaveSameNameWithFormIn: Condition value must have same name with form input name.
region.atLeastOneButtonMustBeAdded: At least one button must be added
region.addAppUserAsParameter: The final function parameter expects a value of APP_USER variable
region.addXminAsParameter: The second function parameter expects an xmin value
region.detailViewTemplateIsMandatory: Detail view page template is mandatory.
region.repeatLastLevelHelpText: When navigation has more levels than defined in template, then use navigation item template with largest level to render navigation items. Otherwise deeper elements are not displayed.
region.preFillFormHelpText: If you want form to be prefilled with data then check it, select view where you get this data and add at least one condition that is used to select correct row from that view. Condition must be url parameter. Eg. if you create link to this page and add '?param_name=param_value' then add param_name to condition input. Then param_value will be used to create query from the view.
region.paginationQueryParameterHelpText: URL parameter that is used for pagination. It may contain characters a-z A-Z and _.
region.columnsHelpText: Report/Tabular Form/Detail View must contain at least one column. Escaped columns do not parse HTML. Sequence must be unique among columns. Link URL may contain special variables &APPLICATION_ROOT& and &APPLICATION_ID&. Link URL and text may contain special variables %column_name% that will be replaced with value of column 'column_name'. For example, if you want to add URL that refers to page 'my_form' in current application and passes on query parameter 'p' with value from column 'id', then you must insert: &APPLICATION_ROOT&/app/&APPLICATION_ID&/my_form?p=%id%
region.redirectUrlHelpText: Redirect URL may contain special variables &APPLICATION_ROOT& and &APPLICATION_ID&. For example, if you want to add URL that redirects to page 'my_page' in current application, then you must insert: &APPLICATION_ROOT&/app/&APPLICATION_ID&/my_page where 'my_page' is page alias
region.tabularFormUniqueIdHelpText: Unique ID of the table column, which is equal to the first parameter of the function.
region.buttonsHelpText: Button, when clicked, launches the database function created by the developer. The function can contain up to 2 parameters: the first parameter is the unique ID of the table column (previously defined) and the second is the system variable APP_USER that equals the username
region.tabularSubFormButtonsHelpText: Button, when clicked, launches the database function created by the developer. The function parameters are linked to tabular subform view columns so the function arguments are taken from the corresponding chosen view column values
region.detailViewUniqueIdHelpText: Table column that contains the unique identifiers of entities that are used to connect the report and the detail view.
region.subRegionHelpText: Detail View can contain 0 or more subregions. A subregion can be connected to a region using linked column: the value of the linked column must be equal to the unique ID of the region. Pagination query parameter is URL parameter that is used for pagination. It may contain characters a-z A-Z and _.
region.formSubRegionHelpText: Form can contain 0 or more subregions. Form subregion can be connected to a region using parent form region prefill columns. NB! Input names should be unique across the whole page. It means that one input name cannot be same as the name of some another input that is used in some form or subform on this page. Tabularform subregion is connected to a region using latter's prefill conditions (prefill view columns that are used in url query string to prefetch data). Form regions are available only if region has prefill.
region.htmlRegionContentHelpText: Use #APP_USER# to display the username of the currently logged-in user.
region.formInputNameHelpText: Input name, i.e., 'name' attribute of the input HTML element. It must be unique within the page and must not contain spaces. One can use the parameter name but has to manually make sure that the name is unique within the page.
region.isTextEscapedHelpText: Determines as to whether the HTML tags will be escaped (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
region.reportIncludeEntityCreateButton: Include button for creating an entity
region.calenderFormatInfoTableDescription: The following format specifiers are recognized:
region.tabularFormXminHelpText: Xmin (version) of the table column, which is equal to the second parameter of the function.
